price: Elçiler ise: "Rabbimiz biliyor ki biz, size gönderilen elçileriz." diye karşılık verdiler.
arabic: قَالُواْ رَبُّنَا يَعۡلَمُ إِنَّآ إِلَيۡكُمۡ لَمُرۡسَلُونَ

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: qālū rabbunā yaʿlamu innā ilaykum lamur'salūna
